The video: s title and description: The title of the video explicitly claims that President Duterte visited the wake of the Gregorio family. This claim is one of the main aspects used to verify the authenticity of the claim.
Circulation after the shooting incident: The claim started circulating after the fatal shooting of Sonya Gregorio and her son Frank by police officer Jonel Nuezca in December 2020. This context is important in evaluating the veracity of the claim.
Comparison of images: The video includes images that purport to show Duterte visiting the wake. However, a comparison of these images with the original photo posted by the Philippine National Police (PNP) reveals that the image of Duterte was digitally altered. This comparison helps establish the inauthenticity of the claim.
Confirmation from official sources: A spokesperson for the presidential communications office confirmed that Duterte had not attended the wake. This confirmation from an official source adds weight to the assessment that the claim is false.
